page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {ENTERTAINMENT} There is no commercial entertainment in the area; the nearest cinema is 25 miles away. The village makes its own which includes:- St.Keverne Silver Band formed in the 1890s from fishermen, farmers and quarrymen. It is the most southerly based band in the U.K. with their own exclusive bandroom. Their instruments are worth Â£24,000. It is also the most travelled Cornish band competing overseas quite frequently. The Ladies Choir perform for charities, churches and chapels. The Kaudlers (Cornish for 'messing about') started in 1967 perform annual pantomimes in the Parish Hall. There is also a thriving Local History Society and a Badminton club. The St. Keverne Male Voice Choir founded in 1944 meets every Monday in the Church Hall and performs for charity.
